backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables defining light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing root div, title, and Google Search Console verification.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for all site pages including Instant Price Calculator wrapped in SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer component with navigation links and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Page layout wrapper providing TopNav, content area, and SiteFooter.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with active-link highlighting and mobile menu.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for Internet Identity login, state, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder for future React Query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useSeo.ts: Hook for updating document title and meta description.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying global styles for layout and typography.
frontend/src/lib/instantPriceCalculatorP: Provides a pricing matrix for services and a function to calculate estimated prices based on service type and work level.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app using ReactDOM, setting up React Query and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: Renders the About page with SEO metadata and a description of the Digital Pro Hub initiative.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Displays contact information, WhatsApp link, online service note, and terms and conditions with SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Shows the home page with hero content, highlights, and navigation options, including SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/InstantPriceCalculato: Implements a UI for selecting service and work level to display an estimated price using the pricing utility.
frontend/src/pages/Services.tsx: Lists available services, pricing notes, and a step-by-step workflow, with associated SEO metadata.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom theme extensions, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Defines the projectâ€™s current state, features, and metadata for a multi-page marketing site using ICP, React, and Motoko.
